Articles.Content:
I've been meaning to start some kind of series, but I haven't been making videos since all my KSP time has been going to developing mods and playing campaign with more or less the same mods as Scott Manley's interstellar quest. I'm up to a point in the campaign where I've decided to aggressively colonize the Jool system, so I thought I'd make a video series on that.

Important mods:
KW Rocketry
B9 Aerospace
RemoteTech2
Extraplanetary Launchpads
Deadly Reentry
Ferram Aerospace Research
KSP Interstellar
Kerbal Attachment System
Kethane
TAC Life Support

After realizing that I haven't used the Gravioli Detector yet, I decided to launch a mission to Kerbin's moons to grab some extra science that will help develop new parts to be used on the Jool Colony Mission.

I made a slightly long video so we can get through the little shuttle mission and move into new and better things. Enjoy. After this, I might start narrating the series since, lets be honest, I don't have enough original music to keep up with these videos.

well that's not fair, you're using cool retractable that aren't available to the public. At least the video's are keeping me entertained at work.

Do you know when you will release the parts pack?
